   12329              :                        std::function<void(crow::websocket::connection&, const std::string&)> error_handler,
   12330              :                        std::function<void(const crow::request&, std::optional<crow::response>&, void**)> accept_handler):
   12331              :               adaptor_(std::move(adaptor)),
   12332              :               handler_(handler),
   12333              :               max_payload_bytes_(max_payload),
   12334              :               open_handler_(std::move(open_handler)),
   12335              :               message_handler_(std::move(message_handler)),
   12336              :               close_handler_(std::move(close_handler)),
   12337              :               error_handler_(std::move(error_handler)),
   12338              :               accept_handler_(std::move(accept_handler))
   12339              :             {}
   12340              : 
   12341              :             Adaptor adaptor_;
   12342              :             Handler* handler_;
   12343              : 
   12344              :             std::vector<std::string> sending_buffers_;
   12345              :             std::vector<std::string> write_buffers_;
   12346              : 
   12347              :             std::array<char, 4096> buffer_;
   12348              :             bool is_binary_;
   12349              :             std::string message_;
   12350              :             std::string fragment_;
   12351              :             WebSocketReadState state_{WebSocketReadState::MiniHeader};
   12352              :             uint16_t remaining_length16_{0};
   12353              :             uint64_t remaining_length_{0};
   12354              :             uint64_t max_payload_bytes_{UINT64_MAX};
   12355              :             std::string subprotocol_;
   12356              :             bool close_connection_{false};
   12357              :             bool is_reading{false};
   12358              :             bool has_mask_{false};
   12359              :             uint32_t mask_;
   12360              :             uint16_t mini_header_;
   12361              :             bool has_sent_close_{false};
   12362              :             bool has_recv_close_{false};
   12363              :             bool error_occurred_{false};
   12364              :             bool pong_received_{false};
   12365              :             bool is_close_handler_called_{false};
   12366              : 
   12367              :             std::shared_ptr<void> anchor_ = std::make_shared<int>(); // Value is just for placeholding
   12368              : 
   12369              :             std::function<void(crow::websocket::connection&)> open_handler_;
   12370              :             std::function<void(crow::websocket::connection&, const std::string&, bool)> message_handler_;
   12371              :             std::function<void(crow::websocket::connection&, const std::string&, uint16_t status_code)> close_handler_;
   12372              :             std::function<void(crow::websocket::connection&, const std::string&)> error_handler_;
   12373              :             std::function<void(const crow::request&, std::optional<crow::response>&, void**)> accept_handler_;
   12374              :         };
   12375              :     } // namespace websocket
   12376              : } // namespace crow
   12377              : 
   12378              : 
   12379              : #include <cstdint>
   12380              : #include <utility>
   12381              : #include <tuple>
   12382              : #include <unordered_map>
   12383              : #include <memory>

   12388              : 
   12389              : 
   12390              : namespace crow // NOTE: Already documented in "crow/app.h"
   12391              : {
   12392              : 
   12393              :     constexpr const uint16_t INVALID_BP_ID{((uint16_t)-1)};
   12394              : 
   12395              :     namespace detail
   12396              :     {
   12397              :         /// Typesafe wrapper for storing lists of middleware as their indices in the App
   12398              :         struct middleware_indices
   12399              :         {
   12400              :             template<typename App>
   12401              :             void push()
   12402              :             {}
   12403              : 
   12404              :             template<typename App, typename MW, typename... Middlewares>
   12405              :             void push()
   12406              :             {
   12407              :                 using MwContainer = typename App::mw_container_t;
   12408              :                 static_assert(black_magic::has_type<MW, MwContainer>::value, "Middleware must be present in app");
   12409              :                 static_assert(std::is_base_of<crow::ILocalMiddleware, MW>::value, "Middleware must extend ILocalMiddleware");
   12410              :                 int idx = black_magic::tuple_index<MW, MwContainer>::value;
   12411              :                 indices_.push_back(idx);
   12412              :                 push<App, Middlewares...>();
   12413              :             }
   12414              : 
   12415              :             void merge_front(const detail::middleware_indices& other)
   12416              :             {
   12417              :                 indices_.insert(indices_.begin(), other.indices_.cbegin(), other.indices_.cend());
   12418              :             }
   12419              : 
   12420              :             void merge_back(const detail::middleware_indices& other)
   12421              :             {
   12422              :                 indices_.insert(indices_.end(), other.indices_.cbegin(), other.indices_.cend());
   12423              :             }
   12424              : 
   12425              :             void pop_back(const detail::middleware_indices& other)
   12426              :             {
   12427              :                 indices_.resize(indices_.size() - other.indices_.size());
   12428              :             }
   12429              : 
   12430              :             bool empty() const
   12431              :             {
   12432              :                 return indices_.empty();
   12433              :             }
   12434              : 
   12435              :             // Sorts indices and filters out duplicates to allow fast lookups with traversal
   12436              :             void pack()
   12437              :             {
   12438              :                 std::sort(indices_.begin(), indices_.end());
   12439              :                 indices_.erase(std::unique(indices_.begin(), indices_.end()), indices_.end());
   12440              :             }
   12441              : 
   12442              :             const std::vector<int>& indices()
   12443              :             {
   12444              :                 return indices_;
   12445              :             }
   12446              : 
   12447              :         private:
   12448              :             std::vector<int> indices_;
   12449              :         };
   12450              :     } // namespace detail
   12451              : 
   12452              :     /// A base class for all rules.
   12453              : 
   12454              :     ///
   12455              :     /// Used to provide a common interface for code dealing with different types of rules.<br>
   12456              :     /// A Rule provides a URL, allowed HTTP methods, and handlers.
   12457              :     class BaseRule
   12458              :     {
   12459              :     public:
   12460              :         BaseRule(std::string rule):
   12461              :           rule_(std::move(rule))
   12462              :         {}
   12463              : 
   12464              :         virtual ~BaseRule()=default;
   12465              : 
   12466              :         virtual void validate() = 0;
   12467              : 
   12468              :         void set_added()
   12469              :         {
   12470              :             added_ = true;
   12471              :         }
   12472              : 
   12473              :         bool is_added()
   12474              :         {
   12475              :             return added_;
   12476              :         }
   12477              : 
   12478              :         std::unique_ptr<BaseRule> upgrade()
   12479              :         {
   12480              :             if (rule_to_upgrade_)
   12481              :                 return std::move(rule_to_upgrade_);
   12482              :             return {};
   12483              :         }
   12484              : 
   12485              :         virtual void handle(request&, response&, const routing_params&) = 0;
   12486              :         virtual void handle_upgrade(const request&, response& res, SocketAdaptor&&)
   12487              :         {
   12488              :             res = response(404);
   12489              :             res.end();
   12490              :         }
   12491              :         virtual void handle_upgrade(const request&, response& res, UnixSocketAdaptor&&)
   12492              :         {
   12493              :             res = response(404);
   12494              :             res.end();
   12495              :         }
   12496              : #ifdef CROW_ENABLE_SSL
   12497              :         virtual void handle_upgrade(const request&, response& res, SSLAdaptor&&)
   12498              :         {
   12499              :             res = response(404);
   12500              :             res.end();
   12501              :         }
   12502              : #endif
   12503              : 
   12504              :         uint32_t get_methods()
   12505              :         {
   12506              :             return methods_;
   12507              :         }
   12508              : 
   12509              :         template<typename F>
   12510              :         void foreach_method(F f)
   12511              :         {
   12512              :             for (uint32_t method = 0, method_bit = 1; method < static_cast<uint32_t>(HTTPMethod::InternalMethodCount); method++, method_bit <<= 1)
   12513              :             {
   12514              :                 if (methods_ & method_bit)
   12515              :                     f(method);
   12516              :             }
   12517              :         }
   12518              : 
   12519              :         std::string custom_templates_base;
   12520              : 
   12521              :         const std::string& rule() { return rule_; }
   12522              : 
   12523              :     protected:
   12524              :         uint32_t methods_{1 << static_cast<int>(HTTPMethod::Get)};
   12525              : 
   12526              :         std::string rule_;
   12527              :         std::string name_;
   12528              :         bool added_{false};
   12529              : 
   12530              :         std::unique_ptr<BaseRule> rule_to_upgrade_;
   12531              : 
   12532              :         detail::middleware_indices mw_indices_;
   12533              : 
   12534              :         friend class Router;
   12535              :         friend class Blueprint;
   12536              :         template<typename T>
   12537              :         friend struct RuleParameterTraits;
   12538              :     };
   12539              : 
   12540              : 
   12541              :     namespace detail
   12542              :     {
   12543              :         namespace routing_handler_call_helper
   12544              :         {
   12545              :             template<typename T, int Pos>
   12546              :             struct call_pair
   12547              :             {
   12548              :                 using type = T;
   12549              :                 static const int pos = Pos;
   12550              :             };
   12551              : 
   12552              :             template<typename H1>
   12553              :             struct call_params
   12554              :             {
   12555              :                 H1& handler;
   12556              :                 const routing_params& params;
   12557              :                 request& req;
   12558              :                 response& res;
   12559              :             };
   12560              : 
   12561              :             template<typename F, int NInt, int NUint, int NDouble, int NString, typename S1, typename S2>
   12562              :             struct call
   12563              :             {};
   12564              : 
   12565              :             template<typename F, int NInt, int NUint, int NDouble, int NString, typename... Args1, typename... Args2>
   12566              :             struct call<F, NInt, NUint, NDouble, NString, black_magic::S<int64_t, Args1...>, black_magic::S<Args2...>>
   12567              :             {
   12568              :                 void operator()(F cparams)
   12569              :                 {
   12570              :                     using pushed = typename black_magic::S<Args2...>::template push_back<call_pair<int64_t, NInt>>;
   12571              :                     call<F, NInt + 1, NUint, NDouble, NString, black_magic::S<Args1...>, pushed>()(cparams);
   12572              :                 }
   12573              :             };
   12574              : 
   12575              :             template<typename F, int NInt, int NUint, int NDouble, int NString, typename... Args1, typename... Args2>
   12576              :             struct call<F, NInt, NUint, NDouble, NString, black_magic::S<uint64_t, Args1...>, black_magic::S<Args2...>>
   12577              :             {
   12578              :                 void operator()(F cparams)
   12579              :                 {
   12580              :                     using pushed = typename black_magic::S<Args2...>::template push_back<call_pair<uint64_t, NUint>>;
   12581              :                     call<F, NInt, NUint + 1, NDouble, NString, black_magic::S<Args1...>, pushed>()(cparams);
   12582              :                 }
   12583              :             };
   12584              : 
   12585              :             template<typename F, int NInt, int NUint, int NDouble, int NString, typename... Args1, typename... Args2>
   12586              :             struct call<F, NInt, NUint, NDouble, NString, black_magic::S<double, Args1...>, black_magic::S<Args2...>>
   12587              :             {
   12588              :                 void operator()(F cparams)
   12589              :                 {
   12590              :                     using pushed = typename black_magic::S<Args2...>::template push_back<call_pair<double, NDouble>>;
   12591              :                     call<F, NInt, NUint, NDouble + 1, NString, black_magic::S<Args1...>, pushed>()(cparams);
   12592              :                 }
   12593              :             };
   12594              : 
   12595              :             template<typename F, int NInt, int NUint, int NDouble, int NString, typename... Args1, typename... Args2>
   12596              :             struct call<F, NInt, NUint, NDouble, NString, black_magic::S<std::string, Args1...>, black_magic::S<Args2...>>
   12597              :             {
   12598              :                 void operator()(F cparams)
   12599              :                 {
   12600              :                     using pushed = typename black_magic::S<Args2...>::template push_back<call_pair<std::string, NString>>;
   12601              :                     call<F, NInt, NUint, NDouble, NString + 1, black_magic::S<Args1...>, pushed>()(cparams);
   12602              :                 }
   12603              :             };
   12604              : 
   12605              :             template<typename F, int NInt, int NUint, int NDouble, int NString, typename... Args1>
   12606              :             struct call<F, NInt, NUint, NDouble, NString, black_magic::S<>, black_magic::S<Args1...>>
   12607              :             {
   12608              :                 void operator()(F cparams)
   12609              :                 {
   12610              :                     cparams.handler(
   12611              :                       cparams.req,
   12612              :                       cparams.res,
   12613              :                       cparams.params.template get<typename Args1::type>(Args1::pos)...);
   12614              :                 }
   12615              :             };
   12616              : 
   12617              :             template<typename Func, typename... ArgsWrapped>
   12618              :             struct Wrapped
   12619              :             {
   12620              :                 template<typename... Args>
   12621              :                 void set_(Func f, typename std::enable_if<!std::is_same<typename std::tuple_element<0, std::tuple<Args..., void>>::type, const request&>::value, int>::type = 0)
   12622              :                 {
   12623              :                     handler_ = ([f = std::move(f)](const request&, response& res, Args... args) {
   12624              :                         res = response(f(args...));
   12625              :                         res.end();
   12626              :                     });
   12627              :                 }
   12628              : 
   12629              :                 template<typename Req, typename... Args>
   12630              :                 struct req_handler_wrapper
   12631              :                 {
   12632              :                     req_handler_wrapper(Func fun):
   12633              :                       f(std::move(fun))
   12634              :                     {
   12635              :                     }
   12636              : 
   12637              :                     void operator()(const request& req, response& res, Args... args)
   12638              :                     {
   12639              :                         res = response(f(req, args...));
   12640              :                         res.end();
   12641              :                     }
   12642              : 
   12643              :                     Func f;
   12644              :                 };
   12645              : 
   12646              :                 template<typename... Args>
   12647              :                 void set_(Func f, typename std::enable_if<
   12648              :                                     std::is_same<typename std::tuple_element<0, std::tuple<Args..., void>>::type, const request&>::value &&
   12649              :                                       !std::is_same<typename std::tuple_element<1, std::tuple<Args..., void, void>>::type, response&>::value,
   12650              :                                     int>::type = 0)
   12651              :                 {
   12652              :                     handler_ = req_handler_wrapper<Args...>(std::move(f));
   12653              :                     /*handler_ = (
   12654              :                         [f = std::move(f)]
   12655              :                         (const request& req, response& res, Args... args){
   12656              :                              res = response(f(req, args...));
   12657              :                              res.end();
   12658              :                         });*/
   12659              :                 }
   12660              : 
   12661              :                 template<typename... Args>
   12662              :                 void set_(Func f, typename std::enable_if<
   12663              :                                     std::is_same<typename std::tuple_element<0, std::tuple<Args..., void>>::type, const request&>::value &&
   12664              :                                       std::is_same<typename std::tuple_element<1, std::tuple<Args..., void, void>>::type, response&>::value,
   12665              :                                     int>::type = 0)
   12666              :                 {
   12667              :                     handler_ = std::move(f);
   12668              :                 }
   12669              : 
   12670              :                 template<typename... Args>
   12671              :                 struct handler_type_helper
   12672              :                 {
   12673              :                     using type = std::function<void(const crow::request&, crow::response&, Args...)>;
   12674              :                     using args_type = black_magic::S<typename black_magic::promote_t<Args>...>;
   12675              :                 };
   12676              : 
   12677              :                 template<typename... Args>
   12678              :                 struct handler_type_helper<const request&, Args...>
   12679              :                 {
   12680              :                     using type = std::function<void(const crow::request&, crow::response&, Args...)>;
   12681              :                     using args_type = black_magic::S<typename black_magic::promote_t<Args>...>;
   12682              :                 };
   12683              : 
   12684              :                 template<typename... Args>
   12685              :                 struct handler_type_helper<const request&, response&, Args...>
   12686              :                 {
   12687              :                     using type = std::function<void(const crow::request&, crow::response&, Args...)>;
   12688              :                     using args_type = black_magic::S<typename black_magic::promote_t<Args>...>;
   12689              :                 };
   12690              : 
   12691              :                 typename handler_type_helper<ArgsWrapped...>::type handler_;
   12692              : 
   12693              :                 void operator()(request& req, response& res, const routing_params& params)
   12694              :                 {
   12695              :                     detail::routing_handler_call_helper::call<
   12696              :                       detail::routing_handler_call_helper::call_params<
   12697              :                         decltype(handler_)>,
   12698              :                       0, 0, 0, 0,
   12699              :                       typename handler_type_helper<ArgsWrapped...>::args_type,
   12700              :                       black_magic::S<>>()(
   12701              :                       detail::routing_handler_call_helper::call_params<
   12702              :                         decltype(handler_)>{handler_, params, req, res});
   12703              :                 }
   12704              :             };
   12705              : 
   12706              :         } // namespace routing_handler_call_helper
   12707              :     }     // namespace detail
   12708              : 
   12709              : 
   12710              :     class CatchallRule
   12711              :     {
   12712              :     public:
   12713              :         /// @cond SKIP
   12714              :         CatchallRule() {}
   12715              : 
   12716              :         template<typename Func>
   12717              :         typename std::enable_if<black_magic::CallHelper<Func, black_magic::S<>>::value, void>::type
   12718              :           operator()(Func&& f)
   12719              :         {
   12720              :             static_assert(!std::is_same<void, decltype(f())>::value,
   12721              :                           "Handler function cannot have void return type; valid return types: string, int, crow::response, crow::returnable");
   12722              : 
   12723              :             handler_ = ([f = std::move(f)](const request&, response& res) {
   12724              :                 res = response(f());
   12725              :                 res.end();
   12726              :             });
   12727              :         }
   12728              : 
   12729              :         template<typename Func>
   12730              :         typename std::enable_if<
   12731              :           !black_magic::CallHelper<Func, black_magic::S<>>::value &&
   12732              :             black_magic::CallHelper<Func, black_magic::S<crow::request>>::value,
   12733              :           void>::type
   12734              :           operator()(Func&& f)
   12735              :         {
   12736              :             static_assert(!std::is_same<void, decltype(f(std::declval<crow::request>()))>::value,
   12737              :                           "Handler function cannot have void return type; valid return types: string, int, crow::response, crow::returnable");
   12738              : 
   12739              :             handler_ = ([f = std::move(f)](const request& req, response& res) {
   12740              :                 res = response(f(req));
   12741              :                 res.end();
   12742              :             });
   12743              :         }
   12744              : 
   12745              :         template<typename Func>
   12746              :         typename std::enable_if<
   12747              :           !black_magic::CallHelper<Func, black_magic::S<>>::value &&
   12748              :             !black_magic::CallHelper<Func, black_magic::S<crow::request>>::value &&
   12749              :             black_magic::CallHelper<Func, black_magic::S<crow::response&>>::value,
   12750              :           void>::type
   12751              :           operator()(Func&& f)
   12752              :         {
   12753              :             static_assert(std::is_same<void, decltype(f(std::declval<crow::response&>()))>::value,
   12754              :                           "Handler function with response argument should have void return type");
   12755              :             handler_ = ([f = std::move(f)](const request&, response& res) {
   12756              :                 f(res);
   12757              :             });
   12758              :         }
   12759              : 
   12760              :         template<typename Func>
   12761              :         typename std::enable_if<
   12762              :           !black_magic::CallHelper<Func, black_magic::S<>>::value &&
   12763              :             !black_magic::CallHelper<Func, black_magic::S<crow::request>>::value &&
   12764              :             !black_magic::CallHelper<Func, black_magic::S<crow::response&>>::value,
   12765              :           void>::type
   12766              :           operator()(Func&& f)
   12767              :         {
   12768              :             static_assert(std::is_same<void, decltype(f(std::declval<crow::request>(), std::declval<crow::response&>()))>::value,
   12769              :                           "Handler function with response argument should have void return type");
   12770              : 
   12771              :             handler_ = std::move(f);
   12772              :         }
   12773              :         /// @endcond
   12774              :         bool has_handler()
   12775              :         {
   12776              :             return (handler_ != nullptr);
   12777              :         }
   12778              : 
   12779              :     protected:
   12780              :         friend class Router;
   12781              : 
   12782              :     private:
   12783              :         std::function<void(const crow::request&, crow::response&)> handler_;
   12784              :     };
   12785              : 
   12786              : 
   12787              :     /// A rule dealing with websockets.
   12788              : 
   12789              :     ///
   12790              :     /// Provides the interface for the user to put in the necessary handlers for a websocket to work.
   12791              :     template<typename App>
   12792              :     class WebSocketRule : public BaseRule
   12793              :     {
   12794              :         using self_t = WebSocketRule;
   12795              : 
   12796              :     public:
   12797              :         WebSocketRule(std::string rule, App* app):
   12798              :           BaseRule(std::move(rule)),
   12799              :           app_(app),
   12800              :           max_payload_(UINT64_MAX)
   12801              :         {}
   12802              : 
   12803              :         void validate() override
   12804              :         {}
   12805              : 
   12806              :         void handle(request&, response& res, const routing_params&) override
   12807              :         {
   12808              :             res = response(404);
   12809              :             res.end();
   12810              :         }
   12811              : 
   12812              :         void handle_upgrade(const request& req, response&, SocketAdaptor&& adaptor) override
   12813              :         {
   12814              :             max_payload_ = max_payload_override_ ? max_payload_ : app_->websocket_max_payload();
   12815              :             crow::websocket::Connection<SocketAdaptor, App>::create(req, std::move(adaptor), app_, max_payload_, subprotocols_, open_handler_, message_handler_, close_handler_, error_handler_, accept_handler_, mirror_protocols_);
   12816              :         }
   12817              : 
   12818              :         void handle_upgrade(const request& req, response&, UnixSocketAdaptor&& adaptor) override
   12819              :         {
   12820              :             max_payload_ = max_payload_override_ ? max_payload_ : app_->websocket_max_payload();
   12821              :             crow::websocket::Connection<UnixSocketAdaptor, App>::create(req, std::move(adaptor), app_, max_payload_, subprotocols_, open_handler_, message_handler_, close_handler_, error_handler_, accept_handler_, mirror_protocols_);
   12822              :         }
   12823              : 
   12824              : #ifdef CROW_ENABLE_SSL
   12825              :         void handle_upgrade(const request& req, response&, SSLAdaptor&& adaptor) override
   12826              :         {
   12827              :             crow::websocket::Connection<SSLAdaptor, App>::create(req, std::move(adaptor), app_, max_payload_, subprotocols_, open_handler_, message_handler_, close_handler_, error_handler_, accept_handler_, mirror_protocols_);
   12828              :         }
   12829              : #endif
   12830              : 
   12831              :         /// Override the global payload limit for this single WebSocket rule
   12832              :         self_t& max_payload(uint64_t max_payload)
   12833              :         {
   12834              :             max_payload_ = max_payload;
   12835              :             max_payload_override_ = true;
   12836              :             return *this;
   12837              :         }
   12838              : 
   12839              :         self_t& subprotocols(const std::vector<std::string>& subprotocols)
   12840              :         {
   12841              :             subprotocols_ = subprotocols;
   12842              :             return *this;
   12843              :         }
   12844              : 
   12845              :         template<typename Func>
   12846              :         self_t& onopen(Func f)
   12847              :         {
   12848              :             open_handler_ = f;
   12849              :             return *this;
   12850              :         }
   12851              : 
   12852              :         template<typename Func>
   12853              :         self_t& onmessage(Func f)
   12854              :         {
   12855              :             message_handler_ = f;
   12856              :             return *this;
   12857              :         }
   12858              : 
   12859              :         template<typename Func>
   12860              :         self_t& onclose(Func f)
   12861              :         {
   12862              :             close_handler_ = f;
   12863              :             return *this;
   12864              :         }
   12865              : 
   12866              :         template<typename Func>
   12867              :         self_t& onerror(Func f)
   12868              :         {
   12869              :             error_handler_ = f;
   12870              :             return *this;
   12871              :         }
   12872              : 
   12873              : 
   12874              :         self_t& onaccept(std::function<void(const crow::request&, std::optional<crow::response>&, void**)>&& callback)
   12875              :         {
   12876              :             accept_handler_ = std::move(callback);
   12877              :             return *this;
   12878              :         }
   12879              : 
   12880              :         self_t& onaccept(std::function<bool(const crow::request&, void**)>&& callback)
   12881              :         {
   12882              :             onaccept([callback](const crow::request& req, std::optional<crow::response>& res, void** p) {
   12883              :                 if (!callback(req, p))
   12884              :                 {
   12885              :                     res = crow::response(400);
   12886              :                 }
   12887              :             });
   12888              :             return *this;
   12889              :         }
   12890              : 
   12891              :         self_t& mirrorprotocols(bool mirror_protocols = true)
   12892              :         {
   12893              :             mirror_protocols_ = mirror_protocols;
   12894              :             return *this;
   12895              :         }
   12896              : 
   12897              :     protected:
   12898              :         App* app_;
   12899              :         std::function<void(crow::websocket::connection&)> open_handler_;
   12900              :         std::function<void(crow::websocket::connection&, const std::string&, bool)> message_handler_;
   12901              :         std::function<void(crow::websocket::connection&, const std::string&, uint16_t)> close_handler_;
   12902              :         std::function<void(crow::websocket::connection&, const std::string&)> error_handler_;
   12903              :         std::function<void(const crow::request&, std::optional<crow::response>&, void**)> accept_handler_;
   12904              :         bool mirror_protocols_ = false;
   12905              :         uint64_t max_payload_;
   12906              :         bool max_payload_override_ = false;
   12907              :         std::vector<std::string> subprotocols_;
   12908              :     };
   12909              : 
   12910              :     /// Allows the user to assign parameters using functions.
   12911              : 
   12912              :     ///
   12913              :     /// `rule.name("name").methods(HTTPMethod::POST)`
   12914              :     template<typename T>
   12915              :     struct RuleParameterTraits
   12916              :     {
   12917              :         using self_t = T;
   12918              : 
   12919              :         template<typename App>
   12920              :         WebSocketRule<App>& websocket(App* app)
   12921              :         {
   12922              :             auto p = new WebSocketRule<App>(static_cast<self_t*>(this)->rule_, app);
   12923              :             static_cast<self_t*>(this)->rule_to_upgrade_.reset(p);
   12924              :             return *p;
   12925              :         }
   12926              : 
   12927              :         self_t& name(std::string name) noexcept
   12928              :         {
   12929              :             static_cast<self_t*>(this)->name_ = std::move(name);
   12930              :             return static_cast<self_t&>(*this);
   12931              :         }
   12932              : 
   12933              :         self_t& methods(HTTPMethod method)
   12934              :         {
   12935              :             static_cast<self_t*>(this)->methods_ = 1 << static_cast<int>(method);
   12936              :             return static_cast<self_t&>(*this);
   12937              :         }
   12938              : 
   12939              :         template<typename... MethodArgs>
   12940              :         self_t& methods(HTTPMethod method, MethodArgs... args_method)
   12941              :         {
   12942              :             methods(args_method...);
   12943              :             static_cast<self_t*>(this)->methods_ |= 1 << static_cast<int>(method);
   12944              :             return static_cast<self_t&>(*this);
   12945              :         }
   12946              : 
   12947              :         /// Enable local middleware for this handler
   12948              :         template<typename App, typename... Middlewares>
   12949              :         self_t& middlewares()
   12950              :         {
   12951              :             static_cast<self_t*>(this)->mw_indices_.template push<App, Middlewares...>();
   12952              :             return static_cast<self_t&>(*this);
   12953              :         }
   12954              :     };
   12955              : 
   12956              :     /// A rule that can change its parameters during runtime.
   12957              :     class DynamicRule : public BaseRule, public RuleParameterTraits<DynamicRule>
   12958              :     {
   12959              :     public:
   12960              :         DynamicRule(std::string rule):
   12961              :           BaseRule(std::move(rule))
   12962              :         {}
   12963              : 
   12964              :         void validate() override
   12965              :         {
   12966              :             if (!erased_handler_)
   12967              :             {
   12968              :                 throw std::runtime_error(name_ + (!name_.empty() ? ": " : "") + "no handler for url " + rule_);
   12969              :             }
   12970              :         }
   12971              : 
   12972              :         void handle(request& req, response& res, const routing_params& params) override
   12973              :         {
   12974              :             if (!custom_templates_base.empty())
   12975              :                 mustache::set_base(custom_templates_base);
   12976              :             else if (mustache::detail::get_template_base_directory_ref() != "templates")
   12977              :                 mustache::set_base("templates");
   12978              :             erased_handler_(req, res, params);
   12979              :         }
   12980              : 
   12981              :         template<typename Func>
   12982              :         void operator()(Func f)
   12983              :         {
   12984              : #ifdef CROW_MSVC_WORKAROUND
   12985              :             using function_t = utility::function_traits<decltype(&Func::operator())>;
   12986              : #else
   12987              :             using function_t = utility::function_traits<Func>;
   12988              : #endif
   12989              :             erased_handler_ = wrap(std::move(f), black_magic::gen_seq<function_t::arity>());
   12990              :         }
   12991              : 
   12992              :         // enable_if Arg1 == request && Arg2 == response
   12993              :         // enable_if Arg1 == request && Arg2 != resposne
   12994              :         // enable_if Arg1 != request
   12995              : #ifdef CROW_MSVC_WORKAROUND
   12996              :         template<typename Func, size_t... Indices>
   12997              : #else
   12998              :         template<typename Func, unsigned... Indices>
   12999              : #endif
   13000              :         std::function<void(request&, response&, const routing_params&)>
   13001              :           wrap(Func f, black_magic::seq<Indices...>)
   13002              :         {
   13003              : #ifdef CROW_MSVC_WORKAROUND
   13004              :             using function_t = utility::function_traits<decltype(&Func::operator())>;
   13005              : #else
   13006              :             using function_t = utility::function_traits<Func>;
   13007              : #endif
   13008              :             if (!black_magic::is_parameter_tag_compatible(
   13009              :                   black_magic::get_parameter_tag_runtime(rule_.c_str()),
   13010              :                   black_magic::compute_parameter_tag_from_args_list<
   13011              :                     typename function_t::template arg<Indices>...>::value))
   13012              :             {
   13013              :                 throw std::runtime_error("route_dynamic: Handler type is mismatched with URL parameters: " + rule_);
   13014              :             }
   13015              :             auto ret = detail::routing_handler_call_helper::Wrapped<Func, typename function_t::template arg<Indices>...>();
   13016              :             ret.template set_<
   13017              :               typename function_t::template arg<Indices>...>(std::move(f));
   13018              :             return ret;
   13019              :         }
   13020              : 
   13021              :         template<typename Func>
   13022              :         void operator()(std::string name, Func&& f)
   13023              :         {
   13024              :             name_ = std::move(name);
   13025              :             (*this).template operator()<Func>(std::forward(f));
   13026              :         }
   13027              : 
   13028              :     private:
   13029              :         std::function<void(request&, response&, const routing_params&)> erased_handler_;
   13030              :     };
   13031              : 
   13032              :     /// Default rule created when CROW_ROUTE is called.
   13033              :     template<typename... Args>
   13034              :     class TaggedRule : public BaseRule, public RuleParameterTraits<TaggedRule<Args...>>
   13035              :     {
   13036              :     public:
   13037              :         using self_t = TaggedRule<Args...>;
   13038              : 
   13039              :         TaggedRule(std::string rule):
   13040              :           BaseRule(std::move(rule))
   13041              :         {}
   13042              : 
   13043              :         void validate() override
   13044              :         {
   13045              :             if (rule_.at(0) != '/')
   13046              :                 throw std::runtime_error("Internal error: Routes must start with a '/'");
   13047              : 
   13048              :             if (!handler_)
   13049              :             {
   13050              :                 throw std::runtime_error(name_ + (!name_.empty() ? ": " : "") + "no handler for url " + rule_);
   13051              :             }
   13052              :         }
   13053              : 
   13054              :         template<typename Func>
   13055              :         void operator()(Func&& f)
   13056              :         {
   13057              :             handler_ = ([f = std::move(f)](request& req, response& res, Args... args) {
   13058              :                 detail::wrapped_handler_call(req, res, f, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
   13059              :             });
   13060              :         }
   13061              : 
   13062              :         template<typename Func>
   13063              :         void operator()(std::string name, Func&& f)
   13064              :         {
   13065              :             name_ = std::move(name);
   13066              :             (*this).template operator()<Func>(std::forward(f));
   13067              :         }
   13068              : 
   13069              :         void handle(request& req, response& res, const routing_params& params) override
   13070              :         {
   13071              :             if (!custom_templates_base.empty())
   13072              :                 mustache::set_base(custom_templates_base);
   13073              :             else if (mustache::detail::get_template_base_directory_ref() != mustache::detail::get_global_template_base_directory_ref())
   13074              :                 mustache::set_base(mustache::detail::get_global_template_base_directory_ref());
   13075              : 
   13076              :             detail::routing_handler_call_helper::call<
   13077              :               detail::routing_handler_call_helper::call_params<decltype(handler_)>,
   13078              :               0, 0, 0, 0,
   13079              :               black_magic::S<Args...>,
   13080              :               black_magic::S<>>()(
   13081              :               detail::routing_handler_call_helper::call_params<decltype(handler_)>{handler_, params, req, res});
   13082              :         }
   13083              : 
   13084              :     private:
   13085              :         std::function<void(crow::request&, crow::response&, Args...)> handler_;
   13086              :     };
   13087              : 
   13088              :     const int RULE_SPECIAL_REDIRECT_SLASH = 1;
   13089              : 
   13090              : 
   13091              :     /// A search tree.
   13092              :     class Trie
   13093              :     {
   13094              :     public:
   13095              :         struct Node
   13096              :         {
   13097              :             uint16_t rule_index{};
   13098              :             // Assign the index to the maximum 32 unsigned integer value by default so that any other number (specifically 0) is a valid BP id.
   13099              :             uint16_t blueprint_index{INVALID_BP_ID};
   13100              :             std::string key;
   13101              :             ParamType param = ParamType::MAX; // MAX = No param.
   13102              :             std::vector<Node> children;
   13103              : 
   13104              :             bool IsSimpleNode() const
   13105              :             {
   13106              :                 return !rule_index &&
   13107              :                        blueprint_index == INVALID_BP_ID &&
   13108              :                        children.size() < 2 &&
   13109              :                        param == ParamType::MAX &&
   13110              :                        std::all_of(std::begin(children), std::end(children), [](const Node& x) {
   13111              :                            return x.param == ParamType::MAX;
   13112              :                        });
   13113              :             }
   13114              : 
   13115              :             Node& add_child_node()
   13116              :             {
   13117              :                 children.emplace_back();
   13118              :                 return children.back();
   13119              :             }
   13120              :         };
   13121              : 
   13122              : 
   13123              :         Trie()
   13124              :         {}
   13125              : 
   13126              :         /// Check whether or not the trie is empty.
   13127              :         bool is_empty()
   13128              :         {
   13129              :             return head_.children.empty();
   13130              :         }
   13131              : 
   13132              :         void optimize()
   13133              :         {
   13134              :             for (auto& child : head_.children)
   13135              :             {
   13136              :                 optimizeNode(child);
   13137              :             }
   13138              :         }
   13139              : 
   13140              : 
   13141              :     private:
   13142              :         void optimizeNode(Node& node)
   13143              :         {
   13144              :             if (node.children.empty())
   13145              :                 return;
   13146              :             if (node.IsSimpleNode())
   13147              :             {
   13148              :                 auto children_temp = std::move(node.children);
   13149              :                 auto& child_temp = children_temp[0];
   13150              :                 node.key += child_temp.key;
   13151              :                 node.rule_index = child_temp.rule_index;
   13152              :                 node.blueprint_index = child_temp.blueprint_index;
   13153              :                 node.children = std::move(child_temp.children);
   13154              :                 optimizeNode(node);
   13155              :             }
   13156              :             else
   13157              :             {
   13158              :                 for (auto& child : node.children)
   13159              :                 {
   13160              :                     optimizeNode(child);
   13161              :                 }
   13162              :             }
   13163              :         }
   13164              : 
   13165              :         void debug_node_print(const Node& node, size_t level)
   13166              :         {
   13167              :             if (node.param != ParamType::MAX)
   13168              :             {
   13169              :                 switch (node.param)
   13170              :                 {
   13171              :                     case ParamType::INT:
   13172              :                         CROW_LOG_DEBUG << std::string(3 * level, ' ') << " "
   13173              :                                        << "<int>";
   13174              :                         break;
   13175              :                     case ParamType::UINT:
   13176              :                         CROW_LOG_DEBUG << std::string(3 * level, ' ') << " "
   13177              :                                        << "<uint>";
   13178              :                         break;
   13179              :                     case ParamType::DOUBLE:
   13180              :                         CROW_LOG_DEBUG << std::string(3 * level, ' ') << " "
   13181              :                                        << "<double>";
   13182              :                         break;
   13183              :                     case ParamType::STRING:
   13184              :                         CROW_LOG_DEBUG << std::string(3 * level, ' ') << " "
   13185              :                                        << "<string>";
   13186              :                         break;
   13187              :                     case ParamType::PATH:
   13188              :                         CROW_LOG_DEBUG << std::string(3 * level, ' ') << " "
   13189              :                                        << "<path>";
   13190              :                         break;
   13191              :                     default:
   13192              :                         CROW_LOG_DEBUG << std::string(3 * level, ' ') << " "
   13193              :                                        << "<ERROR>";
   13194              :                         break;
   13195              :                 }
   13196              :             }
   13197              :             else
   13198              :                 CROW_LOG_DEBUG << std::string(3 * level, ' ') << " " << node.key;
   13199              : 
   13200              :             for (const auto& child : node.children)
   13201              :             {
   13202              :                 debug_node_print(child, level + 1);
   13203              :             }
   13204              :         }
   13205              : 
   13206              :     public:
   13207              :         void debug_print()
   13208              :         {
   13209              :             CROW_LOG_DEBUG << " ROOT";
   13210              :             for (const auto& child : head_.children)
   13211              :                 debug_node_print(child, 1);
   13212              :         }
   13213              : 
   13214              :         void validate()
   13215              :         {
   13216              :             if (!head_.IsSimpleNode())
   13217              :                 throw std::runtime_error("Internal error: Trie header should be simple!");
   13218              :             optimize();
   13219              :         }
   13220              : 
   13221              :         //Rule_index, Blueprint_index, routing_params
   13222              :         routing_handle_result find(const std::string& req_url, const Node& node, unsigned pos = 0, routing_params* params = nullptr, std::vector<uint16_t>* blueprints = nullptr) const
   13223              :         {
   13224              :             //start params as an empty struct
   13225              :             routing_params empty;
   13226              :             if (params == nullptr)
   13227              :                 params = &empty;
   13228              :             //same for blueprint vector
   13229              :             std::vector<uint16_t> MT;
   13230              :             if (blueprints == nullptr)
   13231              :                 blueprints = &MT;
   13232              : 
   13233              :             uint16_t found{};               //The rule index to be found
   13234              :             std::vector<uint16_t> found_BP; //The Blueprint indices to be found
   13235              :             routing_params match_params;    //supposedly the final matched parameters
   13236              : 
   13237              :             auto update_found = [&found, &found_BP, &match_params](routing_handle_result& ret) {
   13238              :                 found_BP = std::move(ret.blueprint_indices);
   13239              :                 if (ret.rule_index && (!found || found > ret.rule_index))
   13240              :                 {
   13241              :                     found = ret.rule_index;
   13242              :                     match_params = std::move(ret.r_params);
   13243              :                 }
   13244              :             };
   13245              : 
   13246              :             //if the function was called on a node at the end of the string (the last recursion), return the nodes rule index, and whatever params were passed to the function
   13247              :             if (pos == req_url.size())
   13248              :             {
   13249              :                 found_BP = std::move(*blueprints);
   13250              :                 return routing_handle_result{node.rule_index, *blueprints, *params};
   13251              :             }
   13252              : 
   13253              :             bool found_fragment = false;
   13254              : 
   13255              :             for (const auto& child : node.children)
   13256              :             {
   13257              :                 if (child.param != ParamType::MAX)
   13258              :                 {
   13259              :                     if (child.param == ParamType::INT)
   13260              :                     {
   13261              :                         char c = req_url[pos];
   13262              :                         if ((c >= '0' && c <= '9') || c == '+' || c == '-')
   13263              :                         {
   13264              :                             char* eptr;
   13265              :                             errno = 0;
   13266              :                             long long int value = strtoll(req_url.data() + pos, &eptr, 10);
   13267              :                             if (errno != ERANGE && eptr != req_url.data() + pos)
   13268              :                             {
   13269              :                                 found_fragment = true;
   13270              :                                 params->int_params.push_back(value);
   13271              :                                 if (child.blueprint_index != INVALID_BP_ID) blueprints->push_back(child.blueprint_index);
   13272              :                                 auto ret = find(req_url, child, eptr - req_url.data(), params, blueprints);
   13273              :                                 update_found(ret);
   13274              :                                 params->int_params.pop_back();
   13275              :                                 if (!blueprints->empty()) blueprints->pop_back();
   13276              :                             }
   13277              :                         }
   13278              :                     }
   13279              : 
   13280              :                     else if (child.param == ParamType::UINT)
   13281              :                     {
   13282              :                         char c = req_url[pos];
   13283              :                         if ((c >= '0' && c <= '9') || c == '+')
   13284              :                         {
   13285              :                             char* eptr;
   13286              :                             errno = 0;
   13287              :                             unsigned long long int value = strtoull(req_url.data() + pos, &eptr, 10);
   13288              :                             if (errno != ERANGE && eptr != req_url.data() + pos)
   13289              :                             {
   13290              :                                 found_fragment = true;
   13291              :                                 params->uint_params.push_back(value);
   13292              :                                 if (child.blueprint_index != INVALID_BP_ID) blueprints->push_back(child.blueprint_index);
   13293              :                                 auto ret = find(req_url, child, eptr - req_url.data(), params, blueprints);
   13294              :                                 update_found(ret);
   13295              :                                 params->uint_params.pop_back();
   13296              :                                 if (!blueprints->empty()) blueprints->pop_back();
   13297              :                             }
   13298              :                         }
   13299              :                     }
   13300              : 
   13301              :                     else if (child.param == ParamType::DOUBLE)
   13302              :                     {
   13303              :                         char c = req_url[pos];
   13304              :                         if ((c >= '0' && c <= '9') || c == '+' || c == '-' || c == '.')
   13305              :                         {
   13306              :                             char* eptr;
   13307              :                             errno = 0;
   13308              :                             double value = strtod(req_url.data() + pos, &eptr);
   13309              :                             if (errno != ERANGE && eptr != req_url.data() + pos)
   13310              :                             {
   13311              :                                 found_fragment = true;
   13312              :                                 params->double_params.push_back(value);
   13313              :                                 if (child.blueprint_index != INVALID_BP_ID) blueprints->push_back(child.blueprint_index);
   13314              :                                 auto ret = find(req_url, child, eptr - req_url.data(), params, blueprints);
   13315              :                                 update_found(ret);
   13316              :                                 params->double_params.pop_back();
   13317              :                                 if (!blueprints->empty()) blueprints->pop_back();
   13318              :                             }
   13319              :                         }
   13320              :                     }
   13321              : 
   13322              :                     else if (child.param == ParamType::STRING)
   13323              :                     {
   13324              :                         size_t epos = pos;
   13325              :                         for (; epos < req_url.size(); epos++)
   13326              :                         {
   13327              :                             if (req_url[epos] == '/')
   13328              :                                 break;
   13329              :                         }
   13330              : 
   13331              :                         if (epos != pos)
   13332              :                         {
   13333              :                             found_fragment = true;
   13334              :                             params->string_params.push_back(req_url.substr(pos, epos - pos));
   13335              :                             if (child.blueprint_index != INVALID_BP_ID) blueprints->push_back(child.blueprint_index);
   13336              :                             auto ret = find(req_url, child, epos, params, blueprints);
   13337              :                             update_found(ret);
   13338              :                             params->string_params.pop_back();
   13339              :                             if (!blueprints->empty()) blueprints->pop_back();
   13340              :                         }
   13341              :                     }
   13342              : 
   13343              :                     else if (child.param == ParamType::PATH)
   13344              :                     {
   13345              :                         size_t epos = req_url.size();
   13346              : 
   13347              :                         if (epos != pos)
   13348              :                         {
   13349              :                             found_fragment = true;
   13350              :                             params->string_params.push_back(req_url.substr(pos, epos - pos));
   13351              :                             if (child.blueprint_index != INVALID_BP_ID) blueprints->push_back(child.blueprint_index);
   13352              :                             auto ret = find(req_url, child, epos, params, blueprints);
   13353              :                             update_found(ret);
   13354              :                             params->string_params.pop_back();
   13355              :                             if (!blueprints->empty()) blueprints->pop_back();
   13356              :                         }
   13357              :                     }
   13358              :                 }
   13359              : 
   13360              :                 else
   13361              :                 {
   13362              :                     const std::string& fragment = child.key;
   13363              :                     if (req_url.compare(pos, fragment.size(), fragment) == 0)
   13364              :                     {
   13365              :                         found_fragment = true;
   13366              :                         if (child.blueprint_index != INVALID_BP_ID) blueprints->push_back(child.blueprint_index);
   13367              :                         auto ret = find(req_url, child, pos + fragment.size(), params, blueprints);
   13368              :                         update_found(ret);
   13369              :                         if (!blueprints->empty()) blueprints->pop_back();
   13370              :                     }
   13371              :                 }
   13372              :             }
   13373              : 
   13374              :             if (!found_fragment)
   13375              :                 found_BP = std::move(*blueprints);
   13376              : 
   13377              :             return routing_handle_result{found, found_BP, match_params}; //Called after all the recursions have been done
   13378              :         }
   13379              : 
   13380              :         routing_handle_result find(const std::string& req_url) const
   13381              :         {
   13382              :             return find(req_url, head_);
   13383              :         }
   13384              : 
   13385              :         //This functions assumes any blueprint info passed is valid
   13386              :         void add(const std::string& url, uint16_t rule_index, unsigned bp_prefix_length = 0, uint16_t blueprint_index = INVALID_BP_ID)
   13387              :         {
   13388              :             auto idx = &head_;
   13389              : 
   13390              :             bool has_blueprint = bp_prefix_length != 0 && blueprint_index != INVALID_BP_ID;
   13391              : 
   13392              :             for (unsigned i = 0; i < url.size(); i++)
   13393              :             {
   13394              :                 char c = url[i];
   13395              :                 if (c == '<')
   13396              :                 {
   13397              :                     static struct ParamTraits
   13398              :                     {
   13399              :                         ParamType type;
   13400              :                         std::string name;
   13401              :                     } paramTraits[] =
   13402              :                       {
   13403              :                         {ParamType::INT, "<int>"},
   13404              :                         {ParamType::UINT, "<uint>"},
   13405              :                         {ParamType::DOUBLE, "<float>"},
   13406              :                         {ParamType::DOUBLE, "<double>"},
   13407              :                         {ParamType::STRING, "<str>"},
   13408              :                         {ParamType::STRING, "<string>"},
   13409              :                         {ParamType::PATH, "<path>"},
   13410              :                       };
   13411              : 
   13412              :                     for (const auto& x : paramTraits)
   13413              :                     {
   13414              :                         if (url.compare(i, x.name.size(), x.name) == 0)
   13415              :                         {
   13416              :                             bool found = false;
   13417              :                             for (auto& child : idx->children)
   13418              :                             {
   13419              :                                 if (child.param == x.type)
   13420              :                                 {
   13421              :                                     idx = &child;
   13422              :                                     i += x.name.size();
   13423              :                                     found = true;
   13424              :                                     break;
   13425              :                                 }
   13426              :                             }
   13427              :                             if (found)
   13428              :                                 break;
   13429              : 
   13430              :                             auto new_node_idx = &idx->add_child_node();
   13431              :                             new_node_idx->param = x.type;
   13432              :                             idx = new_node_idx;
   13433              :                             i += x.name.size();
   13434              :                             break;
   13435              :                         }
   13436              :                     }
   13437              : 
   13438              :                     i--;
   13439              :                 }
   13440              :                 else
   13441              :                 {
   13442              :                     //This part assumes the tree is unoptimized (every node has a max 1 character key)
   13443              :                     bool piece_found = false;
   13444              :                     for (auto& child : idx->children)
   13445              :                     {
   13446              :                         if (child.key[0] == c)
   13447              :                         {
   13448              :                             idx = &child;
   13449              :                             piece_found = true;
   13450              :                             break;
   13451              :                         }
   13452              :                     }
   13453              :                     if (!piece_found)
   13454              :                     {
   13455              :                         auto new_node_idx = &idx->add_child_node();
   13456              :                         new_node_idx->key = c;
   13457              :                         //The assumption here is that you'd only need to add a blueprint index if the tree didn't have the BP prefix.
   13458              :                         if (has_blueprint && i == bp_prefix_length)
   13459              :                             new_node_idx->blueprint_index = blueprint_index;
   13460              :                         idx = new_node_idx;
   13461              :                     }
   13462              :                 }
   13463              :             }
   13464              : 
   13465              :             //check if the last node already has a value (exact url already in Trie)
   13466              :             if (idx->rule_index)
   13467              :                 throw std::runtime_error("handler already exists for " + url);
   13468              :             idx->rule_index = rule_index;
   13469              :         }
   13470              : 
   13471              :     private:
   13472              :         Node head_;
   13473              :     };
   13474              : 
   13475              :     /// A blueprint can be considered a smaller section of a Crow app, specifically where the router is concerned.
   13476              : 
   13477              :     ///
   13478              :     /// You can use blueprints to assign a common prefix to rules' prefix, set custom static and template folders, and set a custom catchall route.
   13479              :     /// You can also assign nest blueprints for maximum Compartmentalization.
   13480              :     class Blueprint
   13481              :     {
   13482              :     public:
   13483              :         Blueprint(const std::string& prefix)
   13484              :           : prefix_(prefix),
   13485              :             static_dir_(prefix),
   13486              :             templates_dir_(prefix)
   13487              :             {}
   13488              : 
   13489              :         Blueprint(const std::string& prefix, const std::string& static_dir):
   13490              :           prefix_(prefix), static_dir_(static_dir){}
   13491              : 
   13492              :         Blueprint(const std::string& prefix, const std::string& static_dir, const std::string& templates_dir):
   13493              :           prefix_(prefix), static_dir_(static_dir), templates_dir_(templates_dir){}
   13494              : 
   13495              :         /*
   13496              :         Blueprint(Blueprint& other)
   13497              :         {
   13498              :             prefix_ = std::move(other.prefix_);
   13499              :             all_rules_ = std::move(other.all_rules_);
   13500              :         }
   13501              : 
   13502              :         Blueprint(const Blueprint& other)
   13503              :         {
   13504              :             prefix_ = other.prefix_;
   13505              :             all_rules_ = other.all_rules_;
   13506              :         }
   13507              : */
   13508              :         Blueprint(Blueprint&& value)
   13509              :         {
   13510              :             *this = std::move(value);
   13511              :         }
   13512              : 
   13513              :         Blueprint& operator=(const Blueprint& value) = delete;
   13514              : 
   13515              :         Blueprint& operator=(Blueprint&& value) noexcept
   13516              :         {
   13517              :             prefix_ = std::move(value.prefix_);
   13518              :             static_dir_ = std::move(value.static_dir_);
   13519              :             templates_dir_ = std::move(value.templates_dir_);
   13520              :             all_rules_ = std::move(value.all_rules_);
   13521              :             catchall_rule_ = std::move(value.catchall_rule_);
   13522              :             blueprints_ = std::move(value.blueprints_);
   13523              :             mw_indices_ = std::move(value.mw_indices_);
   13524              :             return *this;
   13525              :         }
   13526              : 
   13527              :         bool operator==(const Blueprint& value)
   13528              :         {
   13529              :             return value.prefix() == prefix_;
   13530              :         }
   13531              : 
   13532              :         bool operator!=(const Blueprint& value)
   13533              :         {
   13534              :             return value.prefix() != prefix_;
   13535              :         }
   13536              : 
   13537              :         std::string prefix() const
   13538              :         {
   13539              :             return prefix_;
   13540              :         }
   13541              : 
   13542              :         std::string static_dir() const
   13543              :         {
   13544              :             return static_dir_;
   13545              :         }
   13546              : 
   13547              :         void set_added()
   13548              :         {
   13549              :             added_ = true;
   13550              :         }
   13551              : 
   13552              :         bool is_added()
   13553              :         {
   13554              :             return added_;
   13555              :         }
   13556              : 
   13557              :         DynamicRule& new_rule_dynamic(const std::string& rule)
   13558              :         {
   13559              :             std::string new_rule = '/' + prefix_ + rule;
   13560              :             auto ruleObject = new DynamicRule(std::move(new_rule));
   13561              :             ruleObject->custom_templates_base = templates_dir_;
   13562              :             all_rules_.emplace_back(ruleObject);
   13563              : 
   13564              :             return *ruleObject;
   13565              :         }
   13566              : 
   13567              :         template<uint64_t N>
   13568              :         typename black_magic::arguments<N>::type::template rebind<TaggedRule>& new_rule_tagged(const std::string& rule)
   13569              :         {
   13570              :             std::string new_rule = '/' + prefix_ + rule;
   13571              :             using RuleT = typename black_magic::arguments<N>::type::template rebind<TaggedRule>;
   13572              : 
   13573              :             auto ruleObject = new RuleT(std::move(new_rule));
   13574              :             ruleObject->custom_templates_base = templates_dir_;
   13575              :             all_rules_.emplace_back(ruleObject);
   13576              : 
   13577              :             return *ruleObject;
   13578              :         }
   13579              : 
   13580              :         void register_blueprint(Blueprint& blueprint)
   13581              :         {
   13582              :             if (blueprints_.empty() || std::find(blueprints_.begin(), blueprints_.end(), &blueprint) == blueprints_.end())
   13583              :             {
   13584              :                 apply_blueprint(blueprint);
   13585              :                 blueprints_.emplace_back(&blueprint);
   13586              :             }
   13587              :             else
   13588              :                 throw std::runtime_error("blueprint \"" + blueprint.prefix_ + "\" already exists in blueprint \"" + prefix_ + '\"');
   13589              :         }
   13590              : 
   13591              : 
   13592              :         CatchallRule& catchall_rule()
   13593              :         {
   13594              :             return catchall_rule_;
   13595              :         }
   13596              : 
   13597              :         template<typename App, typename... Middlewares>
   13598              :         void middlewares()
   13599              :         {
   13600              :             mw_indices_.push<App, Middlewares...>();
   13601              :         }
   13602              : 
   13603              :     private:
   13604              :         void apply_blueprint(Blueprint& blueprint)
   13605              :         {
   13606              : 
   13607              :             blueprint.prefix_ = prefix_ + '/' + blueprint.prefix_;
   13608              :             blueprint.static_dir_ = static_dir_ + '/' + blueprint.static_dir_;
   13609              :             blueprint.templates_dir_ = templates_dir_ + '/' + blueprint.templates_dir_;
   13610              :             for (auto& rule : blueprint.all_rules_)
   13611              :             {
   13612              :                 std::string new_rule = '/' + prefix_ + rule->rule_;
   13613              :                 rule->rule_ = new_rule;
   13614              :             }
   13615              :             for (Blueprint* bp_child : blueprint.blueprints_)
   13616              :             {
   13617              :                 Blueprint& bp_ref = *bp_child;
   13618              :                 apply_blueprint(bp_ref);
   13619              :             }
   13620              :         }
   13621              : 
   13622              :         std::string prefix_;
   13623              :         std::string static_dir_;
   13624              :         std::string templates_dir_;
   13625              :         std::vector<std::unique_ptr<BaseRule>> all_rules_;
   13626              :         CatchallRule catchall_rule_;
   13627              :         std::vector<Blueprint*> blueprints_;
   13628              :         detail::middleware_indices mw_indices_;
   13629              :         bool added_{false};
   13630              :
